thread.title: Productivity training: Graham Allcott biography
thread.title_full: Productivity training: Graham Allcott biography - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Productivity training: Graham Allcott biography
text: Discover more small business advice » Graham Allcott is a productivity trainer and the founder of Think Productive. He is also a trustee of Centrepoint, the UK’s leading charity for homeless youth. His first book, How to be a Productivity Ninja , was aimed at professionals and became an Amazon “most gifted” book. He has subsequently written two other books, including the student-focused How to be a Knowledge Ninja , which was published in March this year. In 2009 Mr Allcott founded Think Productive, a Hove-based consultancy that offers workshops and practical coaching to help businesses and individuals to get more work done while cutting stress. Think Productive’s clients have included American Express, BT and the Ministry of Defence, while the business now has additional offices in the US, Canada, Australia, France and the Netherlands. • Win a state-of-the-art Canon printer for your SME »
